### The true values
```{r}
grid_t <- seq(0.1, 100, 0.1)

exact_formula_C <- function(t){
  (sqrt(pi) * gamma((t + 1)/2))/gamma(t/2 + 1)
}

exact_values_C <- exact_formula_C(grid_t)
plot(grid_t, exact_values_C, type = 'l')
```
